channel.title: What do you think I should do?
channel.description:
Okay, so now I can't decide myself. I am currently working on 4 games, but I don't know wich one I should really go for. I mean, I can't develop 4 games at the same time. So, give me your opinion. Should I go for
My 2d mmorpg game, wich is pretty fun to make, probably a few people will play, and can't be earned money from.
Or
Work on my 3D game wich requires much time, probably will be played pretty much and can be earned money from.
Or
My vb net "Game" wich can't be earned from, probably won't be played, but is pretty funny to work on.
Or
My java game, wich probably won't be played, isn't fun to make, and can't be earned money from.
So, on wich project do you think I should work on?

item.title: What do you think I should do?
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

u answered ure own question…

[quote=“someone2, post:1, topic:383257”]Okay, so now I can’t decide myself. I am currently working on 4 games, but I don’t know wich one I should really go for. I mean, I can’t develop 4 games at the same time. So, give me your opinion. Should I go for

My 2d mmorpg game, wich is pretty fun to make, probably a few people will play, and can’t be earned money from. 5 pts

Or

Work on my 3D game wich requires much time, probably will be played pretty much and can be earned money from. 9 pts

Or

My vb net “Game” wich can’t be earned from, probably won’t be played, but is pretty funny to work on. 4 pts

Or

My java game, wich probably won’t be played, isn’t fun to make, and can’t be earned money from. 2 pts

So, on wich project do you think I should work on?[/quote]
